title: Circulation of the Arizona Republic 2018
summary: This bar chart has 2 categories for the x axis representing Day, and a y axis representing Circulation.
The highest category is found at Sunday where Circulation is 378602.0.
The lowest category is found at Daily where Circulation is 130283.0.
gold: This statistic shows the daily circulation of the Arizona Republic newspaper in the United States in 2018 . The newspaper had a Sunday circulation of just under 380 thousand in that year .
